description: This file defines a class 'PDFUrlKnowledgeBase' that manages PDF URLs, reads documents from them (synchronously and asynchronously), and loads documents into a vector database with associated metadata. It includes methods for URL validation, document iteration, and loading, with support for metadata handling and async operations.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages PDF URLs, reads documents from them, and loads them into a knowledge base with optional metadata, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Iterates over the list of URLs, yields lists of Document objects after reading from each URL, with support for metadata.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronously iterates over the list of URLs, yields lists of Document objects after reading from each URL.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads documents from a single URL into the vector database, with optional metadata, recreating or upserting as specified.

methods.name: aload_document
methods.description: Asynchronously loads documents from a single URL into the vector database, with optional metadata, recreating or upserting as specified.

methods.name: _is_valid_url
methods.description: Checks if a URL ends with '.pdf' to determine if it is a valid PDF URL.
